## Description {#details}

The goal of this scheduling strategy is to maximize kernel occupancy (i.e.

maximum number of waves per simd).

Definition at line 136 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnschedstrategy-h">GCNSchedStrategy.h</a>.
